hero.title: Student & Parent Testimonials
hero.subtitle: Hear from our community about their Excel Islamic School experience

parentTestimonials.name: Fatima Ahmed
parentTestimonials.testimonial: Excel Islamic School has been transformative for our children. They not only excel academically but have developed strong Islamic values and moral character. The teachers genuinely care about each student's growth.

parentTestimonials.name: Hassan Muhammad
parentTestimonials.testimonial: As a parent, I'm impressed with the balance the school maintains between Islamic education and secular academics. Our son is thriving, and we feel confident about his future.

parentTestimonials.name: Aisha Mwangi
parentTestimonials.testimonial: The school's commitment to excellence is evident in every aspect. From the curriculum to the facilities, everything is designed with the child's development in mind. Highly recommended!

parentTestimonials.name: Ibrahim Osman
parentTestimonials.testimonial: My child's experience in the boarding section has been wonderful. The supervision, care, and academic support are exceptional. We couldn't ask for better.

alumniTestimonials.name: Amina Hassan
alumniTestimonials.testimonial: Excel Islamic School prepared me well for secondary education and beyond. The strong foundation in both Islamic studies and academics has stayed with me.

alumniTestimonials.name: Muhammad Karim
alumniTestimonials.testimonial: The Quranic memorization program and supportive community helped me grow both spiritually and intellectually. I'm grateful for my time at Excel.

alumniTestimonials.name: Zainab Ahmed
alumniTestimonials.testimonial: Excel Islamic School instilled in me values that guide my decisions today. The experience was not just about academics but about becoming a better person.

staffTestimonials.name: Dr. Susan Nkosi
staffTestimonials.testimonial: Working at Excel Islamic School is fulfilling. The school's vision of educating whole persons—spiritually, intellectually, and morally—motivates me daily.

staffTestimonials.name: Mr. James Kipchoge
staffTestimonials.testimonial: The environment here supports both teaching excellence and personal growth. Colleagues are collaborative, and the administration is supportive.

staffTestimonials.name: Ms. Habiba Mansour
staffTestimonials.testimonial: Being part of a school that prioritizes Islamic education alongside secular learning is a privilege. Our students develop into well-rounded, principled individuals.
